Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, representing years of dedication and innovation. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $2250000. I believe its unique features and unparalleled quality justify this investment, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $2,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $2,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
